lead_paragraph: Hope Solo's repeated actions "forced" U.S. Soccer to hand a six-month suspension to the outspoken goalkeeper, United States women's soccer coach Jill Ellis said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Suspended Solo Forced Our Hand With Repeated Actions: Coach
headline.main: Suspended Solo Forced Our Hand With Repeated Actions: Coach

snippet: Hope Solo's repeated actions "forced" U.S. Soccer to hand a six-month suspension to the outspoken goalkeeper, United States women's soccer coach Jill Ellis said on Tuesday....
